title: LOK-IT File Sync for USB OTG
creator: Systematic Development Group

extendedInfo.description: The LOK-IT File Sync App is designed to simplify the process of transferring or copying files between a LOK-IT Secure Flash Drive and an Android device that is USB On-The-Go (OTG) compatible.For a list of these devices that we've compiled, please visit www.lok-it.net/usb-otg-compatible-phones-tabletsNote, Google Nexus tablets DO NOT support USB OTG for USB Storage devices so LOK-IT will not be accessible with the app.LOK-IT is the most secure portable data storage device in the world.  All contents are encrypted with 256-bit AES hardware encryption.  Authorization to LOK-IT is provided via an onboard PIN-pad and without the need for a software login.  Users simply enter a 7 to 15 digit PIN and connect to any USB compatible device utilizing any operating system, including Android, Windows, Mac, Linux, and even embedded systems on DVR, scanners, routers and medical devices.LOK-IT is FIPS 140-2 Level 3 Certified and can be used within US Federal government agencies.-If a full-size USB port is not available on your Android device, a USB OTG connector is required.-Android O/S 3.2 or higher.The LOK-IT File Sync app detects when a LOK-IT Secure Flash Drive is connected and the app will not recognize or connect to any other USB flash drives.  If an organization solely uses the LOK-IT File Sync app to transfer files off of mobile devices, it is assured that the data is completely protected.  All HIPAA, State and Federal data privacy regulations are upheld.LOK-IT File Sync provides an easy way to transfer and copy files between an Android device and a LOK-IT Secure Flash Drive.  The press of a single button can also Synchronize files between the connected LOK-IT and a folder created within the device file system, named LOK-IT Mobile Folder.For additional information about the LOK-IT Secure Flash Drive, what devices are USB OTG compatible, or how to purchase a USB connector, please go to http://www.LOK-IT.net/LOK-IT-File-Sync

reviews.title: Great way to secure data
reviews.comment: I have never seen anything like it. Works seamlessly with my secure USB drive.
reviews.author: Josh Nelson

reviews.title: DCHAD
reviews.comment: I already use LOK-IT with my Galaxy but this app definitely makes it easier. Works as stated, great app.
reviews.author: Dan Chadwell

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: By using this app.I can easly sync my data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Helpfull to sync phone with device.
